A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing Last Jedi for the first time\, my initial reaction was extreme hatred. But\, the next day\, I ponderedany of what bothered me and decided I'd make a final decision on the film after a second viewing. Where Star Wars is usually a film that you can digest in one sitting and be satisfied (for the most part)\, Last Jedi takes the series in so many new and very different directions that you may not be entirely ready. Along with that\, plot elements build to a crescendo of twists not familiar to Star Wars audiences. With this reasoning\, give yourself a second chance to see this movie. You may find you like more than you did the first time around\, but overall\, the hype was too high for this film. Trailers have ruined a great moviegoing experience by making it seem as though we were going to see a very different film. So\, alas\, I find this to be an all right Star Wars film. I love certain elements but truly hate others! As for Porgs\, I can take 'em or leave 'em.
